page.title: 17SUDBURY HILL STATIONS
page.content:
There are 2{stations}at Sudbury Hill. The{British Rail}station is shortly to be closed.{Sudbury Hill Underground {Station}built in 1932,is one of 7 stations on The Piccadilly Line managed by{Area Manager}Mr.R.Emmett.
He has worked for the Railway for{ {39 years.}He chose the job for its steadiness and regularity,starting as a{porter}after leaving the army at the end of World War 2,working his way up to his present position.His{normal {working day}is from 8.30am.to 4pm,5 days a week.Every third week he works a Sunday.
He deals mainly with paperwork but occasionally meets the general public, Sometimes in schools if children are a problem on trains.He visits each station under his charge once a week.
